definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: He powdered the cookies with confectioners' sugar.
Combine powdered sugar and 2 tablespoons lemon juice in small bowl.
sentences.chinese: 在一小碗中將糖粉及2湯匙檸檬汁混勻。

sentences.english: Drain on paper towels and dust with confectioner's sugar.
sentences.chinese: 之後用紙巾將油吸乾，並將食用糖粉撒在上面。

sentences.english: This looks like the powdered sugar we found in the cab.
sentences.chinese: 這看上去像我們在車上找到的糖粉。

sentences.english: We found powdered sugar on the odometer cable.
sentences.chinese: 我們在里程錶的電線上找到糖粉。

sentences.english: To kill varroa mites, you can use powdered sugar.
sentences.chinese: 對付瓦蟎可以用細糖粉。

sentences.english: ResultsThe optimization assistance materials are the sugar and dextrin.
sentences.chinese: 結果優選輔料爲糖粉和糊精。

sentences.english: Stir together powdered sugar and water to make of pouring consistency. Drizzle over the cake and sprinkle the almonds on it.
sentences.chinese: 把糖粉和水混合後淋在蛋糕上，灑上杏仁片即可。

sentences.english: Mix together the remaining cornflour and the icing sugar.
sentences.chinese: 將剩餘的玉米粉和糖粉摻在一起。

sentences.english: Whisk butter and sugar till pale and light.
sentences.chinese: 把牛油與糖粉打至發白。

sentences.english: Mix sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle 2 tablespoons of sugar mixture over each pan.
sentences.chinese: 混合砂糖和肉桂粉，每個麪糊上灑2大勺肉桂糖粉。

sentences.english: Sift the flour into a large bowl, add the sugar and blueberries.
sentences.chinese: 在大碗中過篩麪粉，加入糖粉和藍莓。

definition: abbr. for 低筋麵粉|低筋面粉[di1 jin1 mian4 fen3]
